mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tableaux sacre des figures mystiques du tres-auguste sacrifice et sacrement de l'Eucharistie / de diez, a la tres chrestienne royne de France et de Nauarre Marie de Medicis par Louis Richeome, Prouençal de la compagnie de Iesus
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richeome, Louis, 1544-1625 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: ã⁸ ẽ⁸ ĩ⁸ (leaf ẽ8 is blank) a-z⁸ A-I⁸ K⁴ L-M⁸ N³. [original]
Title within illustrated border signed Thomas de Leu; ill. signed by Leu, C.D. Mallery and Léonard Gaultier. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the library of Petros Crozon, and his wife Catharina (or Catherina) Payen, with their combined monogram "PP" and "CC" in each corner of both covers, and on spine; motto "Charite na peine" on covers; "Roc perronize" on spine. Related ms. records at end of text. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 368. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lord's Supper--Catholic Church
Typology (Theology)
